General.Name: BitRewards
General.Description: BitRewards is a blockchain loyalty platform and ecosystem that enables retailers to reward their customers' purchases, friends' invited and other configurable actions with crypto-currency. BIT is the ERC20 token used for rewards within the BitRewards platform.

ICO.Description:
BitRewards is a blockchain loyalty platform and ecosystem that enables retailers to reward their customers' purchases, friends' invited and other configurable actions with crypto-currency. BIT is the ERC20 token used for rewards within the BitRewards platform.

Team:

  • Alexey Gritsyna: USA BD, e-commerce 
  • Nick Avramov: Head of PR 
  • Rument Slavchov: PR, IR, Marketing and Stucturing 
  • Maxim Litkevich: Technical support engineer 

The BitReward ICO will start on the 1st of April 2018 and will last until the 30th of April 2018. The ICO token allocation represents 64% of the total token supply and will be available for a 0.00003472 ETH base price. The ICO funding target is set at $3M and the cap at $19M.

Token Reserve Split (36%):

  • 12.00% - Reserve for liquidity
  • 14.00% - Management
  • 3.50% - Advisers
  • 2.00% - Bounty
  • 2.50% - Marketing
  • 2.00% - Contingency

The BIT ICO features a bonus and bounty campaign.

Bonus Structure:

  • Private Pre-sale: up to 42% bonus
  • Pre-sale: up to 39% bonus
  • Crowd sale: up to 10% bonus
